messages.author: Mark Mentovai
messages.text: Oh, so now you trust errno to not be corrupt?

messages.author: shess
messages.text:
On 2012/09/19 20:12:33, Mark Mentovai wrote:
> Oh, so now you trust errno to not be corrupt?

Done.  Though at some point we kind of have to assume that it's just corrupt all the way down...

messages.author: Mark Mentovai
messages.text:
shess wrote:
> On 2012/09/19 20:12:33, Mark Mentovai wrote:
> > Oh, so now you trust errno to not be corrupt?
> 
> Done.  Though at some point we kind of have to assume that it's just corrupt all
> the way down...

Yeah, but we absolutely need to crash when we hit this code. If we return from this, we’re totally lame.

message: Back out _simple_asl_log() override, use TLS to flag EBADF check.
